text: Hi Carter, thanks for the quick answer. My workflow is company based right now but the idea in the near future is to implement it with diferent objects like contacts, tickets and more. So if  understand correctly, the workflows API wont work in my particular case.
Correct currently the workflows api only supports contacts, per <@U0157R7AQ84> HubSpot might be bringing this ability to the apis in the near future
Im looking forward for it. Thanks for the clarification!
